text: Here is a potential abstract: A randomized controlled trial was conducted to assess the impact of a multifaceted food security intervention on nutritional outcomes among vulnerable households in rural Kenya. Our findings suggest that integrated food security interventions can effectively improve nutritional outcomes among vulnerable populations, particularly when targeting multiple aspects of the food system simultaneously. These results have implications for policymakers and practitioners seeking to address persistent malnutrition challenges in resource constrained settings.
